commit message: Empty initial commit
Initial creation of Penroser project from IDEA
Add source for jts 1.12
Add EdgeLength utility class and supporting Constants class
Add svg diagram of rhombii in standard orientation for reference
Add uses-sdk tag to manifest
Add out directory to .gitignore

Add initial gl view and geometric objects

Draws a single fat rhombus to the screen

Add skinny half rhombus and child generation

Now draws a fat rhombus decomposed to level 1
Go down a level when user touches screen
Use vbos rather than sending the vertexes every time
Enable nice line smoothing, and minor cleanup
Generate children on the fly, don't store them
Add basic multi-touch scroll/zoom/rotate
Refactor EdgeLength to allow positive and negative levels
Pre-generate 6 levels as VBO data
Implement viewport intersection tests, so that offscreen tiles aren't processed/drawn
Handle negative levels correctly in EdgeLength
Only use a single top-level half rhombus
Implement random upwards generation
Start with a random rhombus type/side
Implement lazy loading of the Geometry object associated with a HalfRhombus
Add some documentation for the fields in HalfRhombus
Rename the EDGE constants, and add support for INNER_EDGE
Remove the single-tap functionality
Implement automatic upwards generation when an edge has been reached
Change the initial zoom to 500
Implement automatic scrolling
Workaround for matrix inversion issue
Add support for devices with don't have mulitsample support
Implement a rhombus pool, to prevent new rhombus allocations
Add missing @Override attribute
Use android's RectF class for envelope calculations
Move the mod20 function to a new MathUtils class, and make it more generic
Implement custom triangle/rect intersection test, rather than using the jts stuff
Remove the jts library from the project
Disable the drawing time log message
Don't allocate new matrices when calculating the viewport
Add the current level to the 'Generated parent' message
Control auto-scrolling with a constant
Fix up initialization of the orthographic projection matrix
Get relative transformation values from the multitouch controller
Keep track of the current offset/scale/rotation as a matrix, rather than as seperate components
Small optimization to calculateViewport
Add support for running as live wallpaper
Add license header to all glwallpaperservice classes
Remove spurious 10ms delay from the glwallpaperservice's GLThread
Minor comment/whitespace stuff
Add support for flinging/positional momentum
Add a fail-safe reset if nothing is being drawn for some reason
Set vbo generation depth to 8, and adjust initial scale
Fix the initial vertex count when generating vertices in SkinnyHalfRhombus
Use an interesting 2-color color scheme
Start with a random vector for scrolling
Fix an issue when calculating the size of the float buffer when generating vertices
Fix issue in MomentumController when only 1 touch event available
Use System.nanoTime rather than currentTimeMillis for calculating the time delta since last draw
Use a static float buffer when calculating the velocities
Minor whitespace fix in AndroidManifest.xml
Use GLSurfaceView directly, rather than the other GLWallpaperService code by Robert Green

Change vbo pre-generation depth to 5

This improves scrolling performance
Add limits for zooming
Fix build issue with last commit
Add thumbnail and additional info for live wallpaper
Don't show title bar when viewed in an Activity
Allow user to toggle full screen mode in the activity view
Refactor out some static data from the Penroser activity into a new Application subclass
Minor import cleanup for MomentumController
add bin folder to .gitignore
Store the current full screen mode as a SharedPreference
Add beginnings of an options page for choosing colors
Set the background color for the options menu and add an outline for each half rhombus
Move the 'Choose Colors' string to the title, and fix up the layout accordingly
Minor cleanup
Add ids for the elements in the options layout
Draw the half rhombus buttons with the correct color that is stored in the shared preferences
Rename LWPGLSurfaceView to a more palatable GLWallpaperSurfaceView
Add NOTICE file and BSD license headers
Create HalfRhombusType enum, and related refactorings
Create a GLContext object to hold the pre-generated VBO data
Make GLContext rather than Fat/SkinnyHalfRhombus responsible for generating VBOs
Add color key and default color to HalfRhombusType, and refactor accordingly
Add preliminary support for changing the colors of the rhombuses in the Activity
Rename GLContext to PenroserContext
Always use PenroserContext to get/store rhombus colors
Add a landscape layout for the color picker
Throw an exception if the shared_pref_name attribute is not set for PenroserGLView
Update application icon
Use alternate method of communicating which shared prefs to use to PenroserGLView
Add support for wallpaper options
Update the min/target sdk level in the manifest
Pause and resume the gl view correctly
Add screenshots
Disable onMeasure logging
Added entry to NOTICE file for the color picker component
Add market-size icon
